Iris:

* Iris heard Ramulus�s voice, and his question.
A battle? There were so many, there would be quite a bit of information and 
data to go through before she would find what he was asking for.
Also, scans on the weapons used in that certain battle, a chip of some sort.
Iris thought for a moment, her scanners going through her data memory file 
as she thought.*

� Hmm�.�

* She would have to narrow it down, but it would be easier of she knew whom 
shot the weapon that this Maximal was asking information for.*

� Could you provide me with a name of the one whom shot this weapon?�

* Her question was simple, but even as she asked the question her scanners 
had already narrowed the possibilities down to a few battles.
But the name of the bot who shot would give her the data she needed to go 
right to the battle with him/her in it�and she would be able to identify the 
weapon he had been carrying.
It was that simple.
But then her scanners located one particular battle in the last ones which 
had been narrowed.*

� Wait!�

* Her scanners brought in a 3-D grid of the battle, from above, side and 
under.
With a repaired projection device she projected the data image into the air 
in front of Ramulus, a miniature of it there instead of a life-sized 
diagram. The projection slowly rotating.*

� There�s a single indication of a strange weapon in section 3.F.�

* She highlighted a single bot and moved to life-sized, while deleting the 
remainder of the 3-D scan. Leaving only a projection of the bot. A triangle 
moved and surrounded the weapon he had in his hands, deleting him and 
displaying the weapon in larger then life schematics.
The weapon moved to the side a moment while a constantly moving flow of 
words/data appeared to the left of it.*

� Model 16 A. Used in heavy military facilities. Classified. Used to 
reprogram the enemy or a turncoat from varied distances, also used in 
assassinations.
Holds 4 chips at one time.
First prototype built in 2391.
Creator, Skiff  Stankly.
Good for righties and lefties.
Last known location: Cybertron Artillery Fair, five stellar-cycles ago.
Last used: Star-date 34 by 62�last week.
Grid 23.
150 yards from perimeter of the Ark.
Need I say more?�

___________________________Zyber

* Zyber sat back on her heals once the beast was against the headboard, 
watching the muscles under his hide relax and slightly wondering just how 
bit they had to be to support the great movement of the creature.
But then she simply shrugged, looking back onto the great things face.
She heard his quiet words and then looked back to the bowl over the fire, 
the tea finally boiling and a smooth and fragrant steam rising off the 
surface of it.
Zyber eased herself to her feet and stepped on the furs of her bed, walking 
over to the filling the stone cup she had brought with the amber colored 
liquid. *

� I drug you here�myself. On my back.�

* She blew on it to cool it a bit before turning towards the bed and walking 
over to it again, sitting at it�s edge and holding cups rip up to the 
creatures lips.
Zyber tilted her head as she studied the animals features, wondering just 
what it could be�but she could never guess. It was everything. *

� Here you go. Drink it lightly and slowly, it is fairly potent. It will 
warm you up�and begin small repairs of your internals.�

* She waited patiently for him to drink, just hoping that he wouldn�t try 
and lunge out of bed again. *
